{{dcl begin}}
{{dcl|num=1|since=c++11|1=
binomial_distribution() : binomial_distribution(1) {}
}}
{{dcl|num=2|since=c++11|1=
explicit binomial_distribution( IntType t, double p = 0.5 );
}}
{{dcl|num=3|since=c++11|1=
explicit binomial_distribution( const param_type&amp; params );
}}
{{dcl end}}

Constructs a new distribution object.

@2@ Uses {{c|t}} and {{c|p}} as the distribution parameters.
@3@ Uses {{c|params}} as the distribution parameter.

===Parameters===
{{par begin}}
{{par|t|the ''t'' distribution parameter (number of trials)}}
{{par|p|the ''p'' distribution parameter (probability of a trial generating {{c|true}})}}
{{par|params|the distribution parameter set}}
{{par end}}

===Notes===
Requires that {{math|0 ≤ p ≤ 1}} and {{math|0 ≤ t}}.
